All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BBQChicken
Represents a BBQ Chicken pizza with predefined toppings and size options.
BuildYourOwn
Represents a "Build Your Own" pizza with customizable toppings and size.
ChicagoPizza
Represents a factory for creating different types of Chicago-style pizzas.
Crust
Represents the different types of pizza crusts.
Deluxe
Represents a Deluxe pizza with a specified style and size.
Meatzza
Represents a Meatzza pizza with a specified style and size.
NYPizza
Factory class for creating New York-style pizzas.
Order
Represents an order containing a list of pizzas.
Pizza
Represents a pizza with its style, size, crust, and toppings.
PizzaController
Controller class for handling pizza orders and interactions in the pizza ordering system.
PizzaFactory
A factory interface for creating various types of pizzas.

PizzaStyle
Enum representing the different pizza styles available.

Enum representing the different pizza sizes available.
